item.title: Report X-2024040541
item.description:
Report X-2024040541

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-18T18:14:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-03
  • City: MAGNA
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Metal drum was dropped from transitional rollers and severely dented on top removable head. DescribePack: Drum head dented causing contents from spilling out of container DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Drum was taken to QA and placed into hazmat tote with liner to quarantine further spread of contents
